excerpt: "Not only is the AI/software not nearly good enough yet, but the laws still won’t allow a driver to blame the AI for a crash (and there are plenty of crashes —at least 400 last year). ChatGPT is amazing until it starts making up information during the public launch of the new AI-powered Bing,"
